title: Skin idea: Hatless/ missing hat Veigar
body:
Hey there,

I've been talking about this idea a lot with my friends and random strangers on lol who supported it.. so i thought "why not make it a post"

the basic idea is just the base veigar skin .. but instead of him wearing his hat, he has a  poor replacement like for example a paper hat (face visible) 
 or a (yordle sized) black head with huge cute cat eyes that just make you go :"AWWWWWWE!"

Sadly I really can't draw so i can't show samples of my imagination but i think u get the gist of it.

for a back animation i thought of his hat lying near him,
he notices and gets happy.
he tries to carefully get closer to it but as he tries to grab it it gets blown away by the wind.
(or any other random thing that makes it disappear)
kinda like scrat from ice age and his nut.

as taunt maybe a sad:"stop calling me cute" or something like that.

or to break the character a little:" I don't know what's cuter, me or your attempts in killing me."
( with  a little professional work this would be really fun imo)

there are so many interactions that would be amazing.
my fav would be one with karma.
(because he is evil and lost something if that isn't obvious.)
and maybe a rengar taunt like:" you sure look like an evil kitty"
(im really not good at this but these are pointing in the direction i thought of)


I and many others  believe that  this has tons of potential.
give this evil master mage a little love.. and take his hat away.

thanks for wasting your time reading my idea of a skin

sincerely yours, Soundslikemelon
